website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a complete set for a young snorkeler, this is the one to get — functional, colorful, and appealing to kids.
pros: Mask fits well, features a strap that is easy for kids to adjust
Travel bag is durable and has mesh compartment
cons: The snorkel splash guard  occasionally sticks, resulting in leaks

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product - do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally able to use on our recent trip to Maui last week. The goggles (not very comfortable) and flippers were fine but the snorkel kept leaking water no matter what we did. We tried to adjust and tried all different options but water kept coming in from the top no matter what. Had to rent snorkel gear for my daughter because no one could use - 3 of us tried using it to make sure it wasn't something she was doing wrong. Don't buy!!! Not sure why there are so many great reviews of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: the mask wasn't great, as the plastic was fairly firm and didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: bought two sets. the mask wasn't great, as the plastic was fairly firm and didn't work to well for our 9 year olds. the plastic doesn't mold well to their faces. They both did better using higher qualiity ADULT size masks that did a better job of molding to their faces.. one of the snorkels had a leaky purge valve so it was useless. Overall, the fins were the only thing that worked well. would definitely recommend purchaing a higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J. Neff

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material.  Not soft silicone but hard rubber.  Leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had four US Divers dive sets and loved them all. My 20 year old mask was still working great until my son dropped it and we lost it. This new junior set is garbage. It’s not a nice silicone material so doesn’t conform to a child’s face. There are visible gaps on the side of my 9 year old’s face. The band has hardly any stretch. This set is not much better than the cheap one my wife bought from Walmart. Snorkel does not have a valve. One small tip and it fills right up. US Divers went cheap on this set. My son can’t use it at all. The fins are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Similar to other USDiver sets
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased sets from Costco in the past and this is comparable to those. Pretty standard mask/fin/snorkel. Nothing special, but seems like it will last just fine. I think there's a chance the costco masks had a little thicker clear rubber/plastic around the face mask (the suction part), but this seems to work just fine. I like the little pocket at the top for the mask. Seems to protect it a little better and helps things fit better in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Fun Flippers
customer_reviews.text: My name is Caleb. I am 9 years old. The flippers are great and fast. The goggles are clear and comfortable. The snorkel keeps water out but if it is beside your ear, it might hurt a little bit. I just move it forward towards my eye and then it sits comfortably. I love this snorkel and flipper set. I use it in our pool everyday. My sisters really want to get a set too. You should get one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Junior Regal set from US Divers for my older daughter and her snorkel is a much better design. We're sending thi
customer_reviews.text: This set fit both my somewhat petite 5 year old and my mid-sized 7 year old daughters equally well. Unfortunately, after about 3 uses the snorkel started to leak around the valve at the bottom where water is supposed to drain out so when the girls put their faces under water the mouthpiece filled with water. Serious bummer. I purchased the Junior Regal set from US Divers for my older daughter and her snorkel is a much better design. We're sending this set back.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for tourist
customer_reviews.text: Just don't. Don't even bother. As a Florida girl, I knew better. But I was lacking snorkel gear for my youngest child. After spending around 30 minutes floating in the water to try and fix her crap, p.o.s., someone else had an extra snorkel for her to use. I knew better than to buy this cheap,ass brand when I (momma)wears TUSA. My kiddo also decided that she didn't want to wear the fins. She said they hurt. Which that's fine. My girls are wahine's. But if your kids are not used to swimming and being comfortable in the ocean then you might want to pass on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set!! It is legit. Looks awesome, very durable, super happy with this purchase. My son said "I can see everything in these goggles." The bag it comes in is super cute and very handy as well. Definitely buy this for your little one!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Helton

customer_reviews.title: The snorkel will fill with water when diving! Cheap plastic!
customer_reviews.text: The flippers are great. But the snorkel and the goggles had cheap plastic compared to other US divers products we have used. The biggest problem is that for a 60+ dollar set the snorkel should have a mechanism that keep it from filling with water when you dive. Not cool. Returning it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ekstein

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand for snorkel gear
customer_reviews.text: Great snorkel set for my daughter. The fins fit my daughter who is in the smaller size of the shoe size for this fun but they adjusted well. The mask is a great fit for a child (8 yo) and the snorkel fits a child’s mouth. We used this snorkel set on a recent trip to Hawaii! Recommend this brand and have another set from the same brand we used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel blows
customer_reviews.text: The snorkel didn’t work at all my daughter had a miserable time in Cozumel using it we had to get her a different snorkel and the mask was to large for a kids mask
customer_reviews.author: Dori Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids, 7-11. (Med 1-4)
customer_reviews.text: These fit all 4 of my kids age 7-11, and I’d say there’s plenty of room on either side of the size spectrum for this age range. Smallest feet are a 2, and the largest are 4.5 and they can use them for a while, I’d guess. Snorkeled with these for hours scalloping. For the money you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but mask is too wide
customer_reviews.text: This set is nice and looks like good quality, but the mask was too wide for my 5yo. I had ordered both a Small and a Med and they only differ by fins' size. The masks/snorkels are the same in both sets. Sadly I need to return. I am hoping the Cressi mask I ordered will be more narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: 6 years and up.
customer_reviews.text: My husband, 11 yr old son, and I all own this brand and we love it! The problem is fitting them all in our laugh age to travel ;) I bought this for my 3 year old daughter to match the family but this small size probably won't fit her until she is 6! But I will be keeping it u too then. I love the water block valve so you can dive under with this mask and the flippers are flexible and long. Bring some amount of dawn dish detergent to prevent mask from fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Bargainshopper

customer_reviews.title: The product was nice but the sizing in the item description was way ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was nice but the sizing in the item description was way off so I accidentally ordered the wrong size. Easy to return but still a pain to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: AMom

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved these.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for a week's vacation on a lake these more than got their use. Unlike some others, my daughter found both the mask and flippers comfortable and easy to adjust. The snorkel design allowed her to expel the water easily after surfacing. Coupled with colors she loved, this was a winner.
customer_reviews.author: growworm

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase Again.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 8 yr old for a trip to Florida this summer. All items were great quality and she loved the colors. The bag was great to keep track of all the items and carry them easily when we went to the beach. she wears size 4 shoes and i purchased the large/x large size. Would definitely recommend as they held up well and the goggles survived multiple uses without breaking or leaking which can be a rarity for kids goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pack for my 5 year old son he loves it for playing in the pool
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 9yo boy. Perfect fit, great value and quality. Adjustment on funs easy and durable. Nice snorkel system. Quality storage bag. Mask fit a child's face and easily sealed. Will be used in home pool, but would be great for beach vacation too.
customer_reviews.author: Stata Babka

customer_reviews.title: This was for my 6 year old grandson. There ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 6 year old grandson. There was quite a learning curve getting used to it. The covered nose of the mask it not what my grandkids were used to. I tried it too and did feel somewhat suffocating. They eventually got used to it and are proficient with the snorkel. My 4 starts only because of the mask design.....it was just hard for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W

customer_reviews.title: Good quality brand
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t used these much yet, but we’ve had 3 other sets of scuba gear between 3 kids. This brand held up and was the best quality we have used overall. The one set that we had of this brand, kid grew out of and passed down to cousin, been used for 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni Linse

customer_reviews.title: Runs small in size
customer_reviews.text: i wouldn't say that these are out of this world amazing but they are a good product only issue is they run a bit small in the sizing and you will get a mark on your toe from it rubbing after snorkeling for awhile they also scratch very easily
customer_reviews.author: Dana Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Broke before first use
customer_reviews.text: Took the flippers out of the bag and put one on the kiddo's foot. Tightened the strap and the el-cheapo plastic on the ratchet mechanism snapped. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Red Blooded American

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! We usually buy Speedo everything, but the goggles kept falling apart...this product is totally worth every penny! We bought one for our 3 year old, our 5 year old and our 7 year old...and they fit ALL of them (and the adjustable straps are so easy that even the kids can readjust them!) and they all LOVE them! Very happy Mama!
customer_reviews.author: L. Fakir

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for our 9 year old daughter to use on our trip. She used them 3 different times and they fit perfectly. Great quality, easy to carry in the bag it comes with and she had no issues while snorkeling. Would definitely recommend for kids that want to snorkel.
customer_reviews.author: K.Tak

customer_reviews.title: Valve broken
customer_reviews.text: We got to our vacation before realizing the valve was broken and the snorkel unusable
customer_reviews.author: V&R Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter set for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old granddaughter before a trip to St. Thomas. She learned to snorkel with this item and had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Yorktown T

customer_reviews.title: Leaked!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two of these sets. Both snorkels leaked. My children we not happy on vacation. Had to purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: robert paganelli

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift foe grandkids, our other granddaughter loved hers so we ordered a set for each grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 year old daughter for a trip to the Caribbean to do snorkeling. I was a bit afraid of the fins coming off as I had read some reviews. But they worked perfect! She was able to wear the kit the whole time at the beach and was perfect because in the tour they didn't have kid size snorkel kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ougm

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a trip to the Bahamas 5 years 6 years ago. Held up great and still use every summer
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Florida bound trip with Granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Granddaughter & she loved the colors that matched! Only downside was the Snorkel is open & doesn't prevent any water from splashing inside while using & going underwater!
customer_reviews.author: LoveFunThings!

customer_reviews.title: Adds scope and fun to ocean or pool swims.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids used these at the beach, and in the pool in their subdivision. Would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old granddaughter- looks great but she hasn’t used it yet!
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: 8yr old approved :)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 8yr old. We get lots of water time in the pool and ocean. He loves this durable set. Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase~!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for our trip this summer, she has only tried them in the bath tub so far but the quality seems great. Fits well on her face (she just turned 5) and she loves the bright colors. Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee

customer_reviews.title: was a great product. My granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had researched further before buying because I did not know this was not a snorkel that would close off if under water. Other than that, was a great product. My granddaughter loved it, used it at the beach, underwater looking at the fish and sea shell hunting.
customer_reviews.author: WV Mamaw

customer_reviews.title: Fits great! Fits comfortable as a snorkle mask can be.. durable! Will last forever.
customer_reviews.text: Goggles and fins fit my 7 year old daughter perfectly.Wore it in the Bahamas. Mask doesnt leak. Great first snorkel set!
customer_reviews.author: Manda Chronowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: High quality snorkel set for kids. Purchased size Medium (1-3) for my 7 year old daughter who is in a size 1 shoe, and got a great fit. The combo set is an excellent value for the quality, and includes a storage case. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: lshockley

customer_reviews.title: great product and keeps kids entertained for hours
customer_reviews.text: We are a big snorkel family living along Jamaica inlet. My kids can use this set independently and has been such a hit 4 friends bought the item for their kids. My kids range from ages 6-11
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Water Leakage
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said the mask kept leaking and I’d like to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Leaky joints
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a trip to Hawaii. A leaking snorkel is not ideal for tracking your young child how to snorkel. Don’t waste money on this. Spend I little more for one with a snorkel that isn’t going to drown your child.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great set but not good for tiny feet.
customer_reviews.text: The fins did not stay on in the water. But the rest of the set was great!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job but not high quality
customer_reviews.text: Just average quality as they get scuffed up almost immediately after you walk into the water for the first time. The snorkel does a good job of keeping the water out, much better than those tubes you get from the renting places at the resort. The best part is that it pays for itself after one snorkeling trip!
customer_reviews.author: Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.text: Our first attempt at tightening the back strap on the flippers resulted in a cracked piece of plastic on the heel, rendering the flippers unusable. I was very disappointed, as was my five year old, who had developed complicated plans to use the flippers to recover the sea chest with the gold bullion in it. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: These work amazing! They are easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: These work amazing! They are easy to adjust, but sturdy to use frequently. I purchased them for a 9 year old: they fit great with plenty of room to grow. The flippers say size 1-3, but I can actually adjust them to fit my foot, size 8 (it is a bit narrow for me however). Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Good quality water gear
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, easy for 7 & 5 year-old boys to put on by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Gore

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel was garbage. No top floating valve and terrible clearing on ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Snorkel was garbage. No top floating valve and terrible clearing on top of that. Kiddo was miserable. Had to buy a functional snorkel while on vacation. After we got some good kit, he was in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: dadablacksheep

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These blow store bought flippers out of the water! The goggles adjust supper fast and easy, I no longer have to take 10mins to figure out what size they need to be! Put them on and pull the strap and if they are too tight push a button and pull the other side and bam they are bigger, but they don't adjust while on your head!
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Was able to tighten the fins enough to fit daughter who wears a size 4 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping is a hobby

customer_reviews.title: The fit on everything is great for my 49"
customer_reviews.text: So far, just fabulous!! The quality seems to be above average. The fit on everything is great for my 49", size 13 shoe 6 yr old daughter. The colors are vibrant. Haven't really tried out the snorkel, but we will be in Hawaii in two weeks..so I will let you know how it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size Small - Little Kid for my 4 year old son and the mask fits his face very well. He is a size 10 shoe and the fins are at the smallest size but stay on. It seems to be a very durable and high quality set, so it should last as he grows into it. I would recommend this set to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ShortNess06

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old. He absolutely loves it. We’re a little sad the snorkle broke within the second use but the flippers and googles are great!
customer_reviews.author: casey jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Fit for a 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my 7 year old boy to use at the pool this summer. Some of my challenges I found with buying the 'youth' sizes in the commercial stores was that the mouth piece would be too large. This set with the mask, snorkel and adjustable fins (which are a good quality) are a perfect fit for my little one. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CLP

customer_reviews.title: Fin broke use before you go on vacation
customer_reviews.text: Mask Is great, snorkel is great. Fin broke on first use and of course our return window was 2 weeks ago. Split down the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Camie ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My 6 yr old daughter loves this set. Great quality and she loves the carry bag to sling over her back and carry wit has her. The bottom of the bag did rip at the seams but I was able to just sew it back together. I bought a second jr set for my 4 yr old son.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Mask was plastic like an stiff. Uncomfortable on her face.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Held up great
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter took this to camp with her over the summer. She used them every day for a few weeks and they held up very good. Great product for the price! She loves that they came in awesome colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mom

customer_reviews.title: Goggles broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one set for each of my kids and both sets of goggles broke within a month and the bags tore as well. They each had a set previously that lasted several years and these only last a couple of months. Super disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kris K.

customer_reviews.title: It seemed very well made & he would have loved it if it had fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson but the mask was too big. It seemed very well made & he would have loved it if it had fit. I would have kept it for him to grow in to but the snorkel leaked at the mouth area. It fit his mouth perfectly so I really wish it hadn't leaked. If it wasn't for that, I would have just kept the item until he was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: beccacode

customer_reviews.title: Cheap! Broke after 40 days.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these goggles on July 12th and today August 23rd the goggle band broke. This is the second set that I have purchased that had broken. Thankfully the first time I was still within my return policy but this time I'm out of luck after just 40 days.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for his 8th birthday and he LOVES IT!! He was a bit of a scared swimmer but he's doing much better now with this diver's gear. Great quality, fits perfectly and the bag is great to store and transport everything. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: K Biv

customer_reviews.title: Served the purpose!
customer_reviews.text: The mask leaked, and the flippers were kind of long for my 7 year old. She got by with them tho, and Id probably purchase another pair since they served their purpose
customer_reviews.author: Tracy's Product Reviews

customer_reviews.title: It is good for growing children
customer_reviews.text: My boys are 8, they have been through several top brand names which they have outgrown. It is good for growing children. Invest in a really good one after 18yrs. This is good for now. Love the fit on the goggles too. Love the feature on the bottom of the snorkel with the waterflow trap. We used to lose this dinky plastic flap in the caribbean islands. Now it is impossible to lose with the trap. Good feature.
customer_reviews.author: CCC P.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: Flippers started to rip and overall didn’t last one year. Otherwise decent product but not going to last. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: M. Korosec

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I bought it for my son but I enjoyed swimming with them :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and the fact that can grow with the child is an extra plus++++++
customer_reviews.author: orejas

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous beginning snorkel set and perfect to learn on
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous beginning snorkel set and perfect to learn on! Good quality and super handy that it comes with durable case for all the products.
customer_reviews.author: keraelaine

customer_reviews.title: Great value great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the sets, one for a6 year old and one for a 4 year old. They fit great, while the mask was ever so slightly large for my 4 yr old, it still worked! They figured out how to snorkel in no time in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Carrying bag ripped on first use
customer_reviews.text: The first time my daughter carried these in their case, the bag ripped along the seam. Extremely poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsti Call

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son
customer_reviews.text: My boys loved theirs! I bought this for my 5 1/2 year old and it fits perfect! He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smith

customer_reviews.title: The mask and fins worked fine for my 7 yr old daughter
customer_reviews.text: The mask and fins worked fine for my 7 yr old daughter, but the snorkel leaked immediately. We were already on our tropical vacation when we realized this so had to use the parts that worked (and bought a new/different snorkel) and therefor I don't think we can return or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: ahaaa

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the rest of the product is great!
customer_reviews.text: Product strap broke on goggles within grandson's first week of use. Simply snapped in the back when putting it on and bc it was a bday gift, by the time he used it the window had closed to return it. Very unfortunate. Otherwise the rest of the product is great!
customer_reviews.author: joyce capela

customer_reviews.title: Great to introduce kids to snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 10 year old son. Fins and mask are adjustable so size doesn’t have to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the fins work and fit great, the mask too but the tube have not ...
customer_reviews.text: the fins work and fit great, the mask too but the tube have not valve so.. is not easy for the children to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Mellado

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This set was the perfect fit for my 10 year old granddaughter! She's only used them a couple times but she loves it! Appear to be very durable, and I love how easy the pieces are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: krenz4ever

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Purchased for my five year old and she loves them! Please note, she’s a very experienced swimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this set but the goggles broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this set but the goggles broke quickly. The plastic lense popped out and was lost in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Port City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This product a whole lot of fun for a little girl her daughter absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: Joe Loftin

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it while it functioned. After 3 days of snorkeling, the breathing tube started filling with water, so we had to find rental equipment. There are no holes or cracks, so maybe a valve problem? My snorkel equipment from the same company had no problems all week
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask /Heavy Flippers
customer_reviews.text: Mask is in fact anti-fog. A major improvement for my 7 year old kid. Flippers are rather heavy - not her favorite part.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Super good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my knees, she absolutely loved them! I was incredibly surprised at the quality. I would highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Mask clasp broke from adjusting first time
customer_reviews.text: We bough 3 and on one the mask strap clasp broke first time we tried to use it just from adjusting. The other 2 held up so far. Otherwise the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kraska

customer_reviews.title: We've used this U. S. Divers Dorado JR ...
customer_reviews.text: We've used this U.S. Divers Dorado JR Mask Fins Snorkel Set several times now for my 9 year old. We live in the Caribbean and go snorkeling when we can. The set works as it should and the carry-bag is a convenient add-on. We plan to use this for many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Boggledude

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel fills with water
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Snorkel fills up with water. Lense fell out of mask when dropped from 2 feet on to deck.
customer_reviews.author: Devine

customer_reviews.title: A fun cracked on vacation the first day using them
customer_reviews.text: A fun cracked on vacation the first day using them. It cracked at the toe area to where you insert you foot. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The goggles have already broken. Item was only used ...
customer_reviews.text: The goggles have already broken. Item was only used a handful of times. Fins are too long for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Will be buying more for my other kids soon! They were a big hit!!
customer_reviews.author: Freda Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag had a hole in the bottom. Everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product was not good at all. The mask did not have a good seal, which led to water entering the mask as soon as it contacted water. The snorkle kept filling with water as well. The bag ripped the first day my daughter used it. This is sad, I was expecting this product to work wonders since I have one of these masks for myself. I had to buy another mask (another brand).
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ramos

customer_reviews.title: 5th time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th time I have purchased this particular brand. We LOVE them,they are great quality. This pair was for my 12 year old daughter who wears a size 2 shoes, fot perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AJones Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We just used these on our family vacation and they worked great! Our daughter absolutely loved them and loved being able to see in the ocean!
customer_reviews.author: D M Watts

customer_reviews.title: The mask and fins are good but the snorkel is not a dry snorkel even ...
customer_reviews.text: The mask and fins are good but the snorkel is not a dry snorkel even though it looks like one. The piece on the top of the snorkel is purely decorative. My 8-year old is used to having a dry snorkel so I had to buy one separately.
customer_reviews.author: George G. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Will be great for the pool in the summer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our little girl for her birthday. She loves it. Will be great for the pool in the summer. She turned 6. Mask is a little big but seals up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay...
customer_reviews.text: Good, BUT mask strap broke easily in few weeks as my son said it broke easily and not able to get a strap replacement.Don't know if my son will use his mask again for the coming summer... Bummer...
customer_reviews.author: Scoutmaster

customer_reviews.title: It Was A Hit Until...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves U.S. Divers Jr. Dorado Mask & Fins. She's worn it in the bathtub, that's how much she loves it. My one complaint is that the fins didn't make it to the end of the summer before splitting at the top of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Raevyn

customer_reviews.title: exceed my expectations for a kids set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set for a kid. The goggles actually are leakproof, the snorkel has a great little valve for getting rid of water, and the flippers are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: My kids liked these sets. They are durable and fit right in their bag when they aren't using them. The fins really help you swim faster. It was a good price for what we got.
customer_reviews.author: A real Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Strongly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are well made. The feet are expandable and the mouthpiece has a water release. My 5 year son wore this everyday in Martinique to snorkle like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: A CT teacher

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel set
customer_reviews.text: Great value and wonderful product. My granddaughter is loving this set. She spends a lot of time in the pool and really enjoys this set.
customer_reviews.author: Texan Amazonian

product_meta.title: U.S. Divers Dorado Mask, Proflex Fins and Sea Breeze Snorkel Combo Set
feature_bullets: KIDS SNORKEL SET: Innovative snorkel mask designed to perfectly fit kids' faces
JUNIOR FACE SKIRT: Equipped with a junior face skirt that makes it perfect for kids 6 and up
COMFORTABLE MOUTHPIECE: Ergonomically shaped mouthpiece for great comfort
PRO-GLIDE ADJUSTMENT SYSTEM: Pinch and pull Pro-Glide buckle system for easy adjustments
3 DIFFERENT SIZES: Available in 3 Unique Sizes: Small (9-13), Medium (1-4), Large (5-8)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
